DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect contact lens lubricity lid wiper epitheliopathy ( LWE ) symptomatic contact lens wearer . LWE define alteration portion marginal conjunctival epithelium upper eyelid wipe ocular surface blinking .
DOC.detailed_description: This study conduct two stage . In Stage 1 , participant wear either spectacle contact lenses two week determine impact interruption contact lens wear LWE . In Stage 2 , second cohort participant wear one two contact lens brand two week , LWE ocular discomfort compare .
DOC.criteria: Sign Informed Consent document . Severe lid wiper epitheliopathy ( upper lid ) either eye . Currently wear spherical daily disposable soft contact lenses daily wear soft contact lenses eye least 3 month contact lens wear experience . Symptomatic determine SPEED questionnaire . Willing follow visit schedule . Habitual contact lens power range 1.00 6.00 diopter ( D ) best correct distance visual acuity great equal 20/25 eye . Astigmatism le equal 0.75D . Possess spectacles provide visual acuity least 20/25 eye . Willing able complete daily diary . Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Eye injury within 12 week immediately prior enrollment . Any ocular condition would contraindicate contact lens wear . Any use systemic ocular medication would contraindicate contact lens wear , determine investigator . Currently wear toric multifocal soft contact lens . Participation clinical study ( include contact lens contact lens care product ) within previous 30 day . Routinely sleeps lens least 1 night per week . Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
